Description:
Located in the centre of the spa town of Arandjelovac, this luxurious 5-star hotel is next to Bukovicka Park. It features a large spa area with indoor and outdoor pools. An aqua park is also on site.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms of Hotel Izvor have an LCD TV with DVD player, a balcony, a minibar, and a bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms feature a private hot tub.

In Hotel Izvors spa complex, guests can relax in a wide range of saunas, steam baths and other wellness facilities. A large selection of massage, beauty and health treatments is available.

Guests of the Izvor can dine in the main buffet restaurant and in 2 à la carte restaurants serving international and Italian cuisine. There is also a lobby bar and a bar in the bowling alley.

Hotel Izvor features an internet café and offers free Wi-Fi. There is also a childrens playroom. Various daily excursions, such as trips to Oplenac, Oraac or to Monasteries dating back from 14th century, as well as wine tastings can be organised on site.

Belgrade is 75 km away from Hotel Izvor. Free private parking is available on site.

Description:
Situated within 500 metres of Izvor Aqua Park in Arandjelovac, "COMPLEX FAMILY" URP provides accommodation with a flat-screen TV. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

A patio with mountain views is offered in every unit.

Guests can make use of the hot tub.

A barbecue can be found at the bed and breakfast, along with a childrens playground.

Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport is 92 km from the property.

Description:
Park Srce Apartments provides free Wi-Fi and free parking just opposite the Bukovicka Banja park, which features a rehabilitation centre with spa facilities and thermal water. Its air-conditioned apartments have LCD cable TV and a balcony.

A pizza restaurant and a pastry bar with a summer terrace are part of the same building, while a grocery shop is right next door to the Park Srce Apartments.

Each apartment has a kitchen and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

The owner can arrange massage treatments on site, as well as bike and car rental services. Horseback riding opportunities can be organised at a ranch 4 km away.

Arandelovac Bus Station is 300 metres from Apartments Park Srce. Please inform Park Srce Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Featuring a barbecue and a terrace, Akva Gold Guest house offers air-conditioned accommodation in Arandjelovac. Guests can visit a nearby Aqua park Izvor, located 750 metres from the property. Free private parking is available on site and free WiFi is offered in public areas.

Fitted with a flat-screen TV, units include a terrace and a kitchenette with a dining area. Bathroom is fitted with a shower and includes towels.

There is a shared lounge at the property. Guests can enjoy a drink at a bar that offers a spacious terrace or engage in various activities, such as horse riding and cycling. Bukulja view-point is a popular hiking destination at a distance of 3.2 km from the property.

Park Bukovicke Banje is 900 metres from Akva Gold Guest house, while Arandjelovac Centre can be reached within 1.5 km. The Main Bus station is at a distance of 2 km while Nikola Tesla Airport is 88 km from the property. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Etno Guest House Gorski car is set in Arandjelovac, 1.3 km from Izvor Aqua Park. The property has an on-site restaurant that offers traditional Serbian cuisine. Guests can enjoy the views of the surrounding area from the garden or the patio.

All units are decorated with hardwood furnishings, come with cable TV and provide views of the garden. Private bathrooms include a shower.

Activities such as hiking and nature walks can be enjoyed in the surrounding area

The nearest airport is Nikola Tesla Airport, 61 km from the property. Free parking is provided on site.

Description:
Located in Arandjelovac, 30 km from Rudnik Thermal Spa and 3.8 km from Izvor Aqua Park, Contemporary Home provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a bar and a garden. Featuring free private parking, the holiday home is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and fishing.

The holiday home comes with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with garden views.

The holiday home features a terrace.

Arandjelovac is 1.6 km from Contemporary Home, while Vrbica is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Morava Airport, 80 km from the accommodation. A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Featuring an on-site swimming pool and wellness area, Resort Relax is set in Kovacica, 47 km from Belgrade. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a restaurant serving International cuisine accompanied by an extensive wine list.

All rooms feature cable TV, a desk and a small kitchenette with a stove and a fridge. Each comprises a bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

In the Resort Relaxs wellness centre guests can enjoy a gym, a hot tub and a Finnish sauna. Various massage treatments can be arranged. Football, basketball, volleyball and tennis court are also at guests disposal.

The conference room seats up to 200 participants, boasting a conference system for simultaneous translation with equipment for up to 4 working languages.

A local bus stop with links to Pancevo and Belgrade can be reached within 100 metres. The Main Bus Station is in the town of Pancevo, 26 km away. Belgrade Airport is at a distance of 60 km.

Description:
Situated in Novi Becej, 700 metres from Novi Becej, Hotel Tiski Cvet features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a kids club, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property has an indoor pool, nightclub and a 24-hour front desk.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and bathrobes, all rooms at Hotel Tiski Cvet have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a seating area. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Tiski Cvet.

The hotel offers a childrens playground. Bike hire and car hire are available at Hotel Tiski Cvet and the area is popular for cycling and fishing.

eleznicka Stanica Novi Becej is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Kumane is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Belgrade Nikola Tesla, 118 km from Hotel Tiski Cvet, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Featuring garden views, Dvorac Fantast in Becej offers accommodation, a garden, a terrace and a shared lounge. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

The bed and breakfast offers a continental or American breakfast. There is an on-site restaurant, which serves a variety of European dishes.

Dvorac Fantast offers a childrens playground. A business centre with a fax machine and photocopier is at guests disposal at the accommodation.

Description:
HeadLine : In Belgrade (Savski Venac)

Location : Located in Belgrade (Savski Venac), Villa Mystique is within a 5-minute drive of Tito s Mausoleum and Topcider Park. This 4-star hotel is 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Knez Mihailova Street and 3.8 mi (6.1 km) from Danube River.

Rooms : Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 13 guestrooms, featuring private pools and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include desks and minibars, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel s 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Nikola Tesla Museum

Location : A stay at Metropol Palace Belgrade places you in the heart of Belgrade, steps from Metropol Palace Hotel Convention Center and 4 minutes by foot from Tasmajdan Park. This 5-star hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Knez Mihailova Street and 1.9 mi (3.1 km) from Danube River.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 236 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel s 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

Description:
HeadLine : In Belgrade (Vracar)

Location : With a stay at Crystal Hotel Belgrade, you ll be centrally located in Belgrade, just a 5-minute walk from National Library of Serbia and 5 minutes by foot from Saint Sava Cathedral. This 4-star hotel is 1.5 mi (2.4 km) from Knez Mihailova Street and 3.2 mi (5.2 km) from Danube River.

Rooms : Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 44 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring heated floors and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Description:
Skadarlija Apartments are located in the very center of Belgrade, one minute walk from the lively bohemian quarter Skadarlija and Republic Square. Free Wi-Fi is provided for all guests.

Apartments are air-conditioned and offer cable TV and a bathroom equipped with free toiletries. A shower or a spa bath is provided in each apartment. Studios and apartments provide a fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette.

The first floor of the Skadarlija offers a large terrace with a seating area. The building itself is a historic landmark. The nearest grocery shop is 100 metres away.

Knez Mihailova Street, the famous pedestrian shopping area, is just a 2-minute walk away. Bajloni Market, where guests can buy fresh produce can be reached in 5 minutes. The Belgrade Zoo and the Kalemegdan Fortress are 8 minutes away.

Beograd Airport is 15 km from the Skadarlija. Shuttle service can be arranged upon request. Main Train and Bus Stop are 1.5 km from the Skadarlija Apartments. Please inform Apartments Skadarlija in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at Central Hotel in Belgrade, you''ll be minutes from Nikolajevska Church and Millenary Monument. This hotel is within close proximity of Sportski Centar 11. april and Bezanijska Kosa Hospital.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 25 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and safes.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Central Hotel.
HotelFacilities: Restaurant Diners Club American Express Visa

Description:
Featuring an indoor pool and a spa centre, Hotel Garni City Code Vizura is located in a peaceful part of Zemun, 1 km from the centre. It features modernly furnished fully equipped accommodation units with free WiFi, a lounge area and a bar. Breakfast is served in the dining area each day.

All units at the City Code are fitted with stylish furniture and modern amenities such as air-conditioning, a minibar, a flat-screen TV, a phone and a desk. Private bathroom offers a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A snack bar is available on site and offers light meals for lunch and dinner. Newspapers are provided at the bar and the reception features a free safe. The Hotel Garni City Code Vizuras modernly designed spa center includes a sauna. Various massage treatments can also be arranged.

The helpful staff will happily organise car rentals, guided tours and tickets for theatre and cinema shows or concerts. A sports centre featuring basketball and volleyball courts is available just a few steps away, while a Spa Centre with an indoor pool, a sauna and a fitness area can be found 50 metres away.

The centre of Zemun is 1 km away, while Belgrade is 9 km away. Local buses stop 20 metres from the property, while the Main Bus and Train Station is 10 km away, in Belgrade. Belgrade Airport can be reached in 10 km.

Description:
HeadLine : In Belgrade (Zemun)

Location : With a stay at Hotel Contact in Belgrade (Zemun), you ll be within a 15-minute walk of Danube River and Great War Island. This hotel is 3.3 mi (5.3 km) from Knez Mihailova Street and 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Lido Beach.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 13 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite at the hotel s coffee shop/cafe. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10 AM.

Description:
Centrally located in Belgrade, Hotel Dom offers free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking. The à la carte restaurant serves traditional Serbian cuisine. Knez Mihailova pedestrian zone with shops and numerous cafés can be reached within 1.5 km.

A desk, closet and bathroom with shower are featured in each room. Guests can relax in the garden where outdoor dining is available. Breakfast is served each morning.

The majority of Belgrades historic sights, museums, galleries and theatres can be reached on foot. Kalemegdan Fortress is 2 km from Hotel Dom.

The Main Bus and Train Stations are 1.5 km away. Belgrade International Airport is 15 km from the Dom.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Belgrade Zoo

Location : With a stay at Adresa Suites in Belgrade (Novi Beograd), you ll be within a 5-minute drive of Danube River and Great War Island. This 4-star hotel is 2.5 mi (4 km) from Knez Mihailova Street and 1 mi (1.5 km) from Kombank Arena.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel s coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

Description:
Located in the center of the Bohemian quarter Skadarlija and surrounded by oldest restaurants, bars and clubs in the city,  Revellers Hostel is just a short walk away from all major Belgrade sites and attractions. Free Wi-Fi is available all over the property.

All rooms are spacious and feature natural light and air-conditioning. Some also have a balcony overlooking Skadarlija Street or the garden. Every bed comes with free linen and a spacious locker for your luggage. Shared bathroom with toilet is provided for all guests.

Tourist maps and guides are available at the front desk. Guests can cook in the shared kitchen with kitchenware and some amenities. A washer-dryer is available for an additional cost. A spacious common terrace is at guests disposal.

The hostel bar offers various events and hangouts for guests while Belgrades vivid nightlife can be enjoyed at Splavovi, 2 km away. Kalemegdan Fortress is 400 metres away and can be reached by a walk along the Knez Mihailova shopping street.

Grocery shop is 100 metres away, as well as the local bus stop. Revellers Hostel is easily accessible from main Bus station and very well connected to any part of the city with public buses from Republic Square. Belgrade Airport is 20 km away. Please inform Revellers Hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Set in the countryside and 7.8 km from Boljevac, Hotel Etno Centar Balasevic offers pet-friendly accommodation with a range of outdoor facilities for guests. It comes with outdoor and indoor swimming pools, a sun terrace and a tennis court.

Rooms are fitted with a TV and private bathroom. Extras include slippers and free toiletries. Each room comes with views of the mountain, pool or garden. Free WiFi is provided in all areas.

Guests can enjoy a meal at the tavern or a drink at the bar and relax at the terrace. There is as a spa and wellness area with saunas and hot tub while aqua park facilities are also offered at the pool area.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Zajecar is 37 km away while Bor is 43 km from the property. Free private parking is available on site. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Hostel Panorama is located in Boljevac and features free bikes and a terrace. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. Rooms include a TV with cable channels.

At the hostel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Guests at Hostel Panorama will be able to enjoy activities in and around Boljevac, like cycling.

Soko Banja is 31 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Constantine the Great, 82 km from Hostel Panorama, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
